verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, If a soul <WH5315> shall sin <WH2398> <WH8799> through ignorance <WH7684> against any of the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> concerning things which ought not to be done <WH6213> <WH8735>, and shall do <WH6213> <WH8804> against any <WH259> of them <WH2007>:

If the Kohen <WH3548> that is anointed <WH4899> do sin <WH2398> <WH8799> according to the sin <WH819> of the people <WH5971>; then let him bring <WH7126> <WH8689> for his sin <WH2403>, which he hath sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, a young <WH1241> <WH1121> bullock <WH6499> without blemish <WH8549> unto the YY <WH3068> for a sin offering <WH2403>.

And he shall bring <WH935> <WH8689> the bullock <WH6499> unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>; and shall lay <WH5564> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027> upon the bullock's <WH6499> head <WH7218>, and kill <WH7819> <WH8804> the bullock <WH6499> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> that is anointed <WH4899> shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the bullock's <WH6499> blood <WH1818>, and bring <WH935> <WH8689> it to the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>:

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall dip <WH2881> <WH8804> his finger <WH676> in the blood <WH1818>, and sprinkle <WH5137> <WH8689> of the blood <WH1818> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, before <WH6440> the vail <WH6532> of the sanctuary <WH6944>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall put <WH5414> <WH8804> some of the blood <WH1818> upon the shofars <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> of sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, which is in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>; and shall pour <WH8210> <WH8799> all the blood <WH1818> of the bullock <WH6499> at the bottom <WH3247> of the altar <WH4196> of the burnt offering <WH5930>, which is at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And he shall take off <WH7311> <WH8686> from it all the fat <WH2459> of the bullock <WH6499> for the sin offering <WH2403>; the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH8764> the inwards <WH7130>, and all the fat <WH2459> that is upon the inwards <WH7130>,

And the two <WH8147> kidneys <WH3629>, and the fat <WH2459> that is upon them, which is by the flanks <WH3689>, and the caul <WH3508> above the liver <WH3516>, with the kidneys <WH3629>, it shall he take away <WH5493> <WH8686>,

As it was taken off <WH7311> <WH8714> from the bullock <WH7794> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>: and the Kohen <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> them upon the altar <WH4196> of the burnt offering <WH5930>.
And the skin <WH5785> of the bullock <WH6499>, and all his flesh <WH1320>, with his head <WH7218>, and with his legs <WH3767>, and his inwards <WH7130>, and his dung <WH6569>,

Havahn the whole bullock <WH6499> shall he carry forth <WH3318> <WH8689> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> unto a clean <WH2889> place <WH4725>, where the ashes <WH1880> are poured out <WH8211>, and burn <WH8313> <WH8804> him on the wood <WH6086> with fire <WH784>: where <WH413> the ashes <WH1880> are poured out <WH8211> shall he be burnt <WH8313> <WH8735>.

And if the whole congregation <WH5712> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> sin through ignorance <WH7686> <WH8799>, and the thing <WH1697> be hid <WH5956> <WH8738> from the eyes <WH5869> of the assembly <WH6951>, and they have done <WH6213> <WH8804> somewhat against any <WH259> of the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> concerning things which should not be done <WH6213> <WH8735>, and are guilty <WH816> <WH8804>;

When the sin <WH2403>, which they have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against it, is known <WH3045> <WH8738>, then the congregation <WH6951> shall offer <WH7126> <WH8689> a young <WH1241> <WH1121> bullock <WH6499> for the sin <WH2403>, and bring <WH935> <WH8689> him before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And the elders <WH2205> of the congregation <WH5712> shall lay <WH5564> <WH8804> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the bullock <WH6499> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: and the bullock <WH6499> shall be killed <WH7819> <WH8804> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.
And the Kohen <WH3548> that is anointed <WH4899> shall bring <WH935> <WH8689> of the bullock's <WH6499> blood <WH1818> to the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>:

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall dip <WH2881> <WH8804> his finger <WH676> in some of the blood <WH1818>, and sprinkle <WH5137> <WH8689> it seven <WH7651> times <WH6471> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, even before <WH6440> the vail <WH6532>.

And he shall put <WH5414> <WH8799> some of the blood <WH1818> upon the shofars <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> which is before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, that is in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and shall pour out <WH8210> <WH8799> all the blood <WH1818> at the bottom <WH3247> of the altar <WH4196> of the burnt offering <WH5930>, which is at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.
And he shall take <WH7311> <WH8686> all his fat <WH2459> from him, and burn <WH6999> <WH8689> it upon the altar <WH4196>.

And he shall do <WH6213> <WH8804> with the bullock <WH6499> as he did <WH6213> <WH8804> with the bullock <WH6499> for a sin offering <WH2403>, so shall he do <WH6213> <WH8799> with this: and the Kohen <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8765> for them, and it shall be forgiven <WH5545> <WH8738> them.

And he shall carry forth <WH3318> <WH8689> the bullock <WH6499> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>, and burn <WH8313> <WH8804> him as he burned <WH8313> <WH8804> the first <WH7223> bullock <WH6499>: it is a sin offering <WH2403> for the congregation <WH6951>.

When a ruler <WH5387> hath sinned <WH2398> <WH8799>, and done <WH6213> <WH8804> somewhat through ignorance <WH7684> against any <WH259> of the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> his 'Elohim <WH430> concerning things which should not be done <WH6213> <WH8735>, and is guilty <WH816> <WH8804>;

Or if his sin <WH2403>, wherein he hath sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, come to his knowledge <WH3045> <WH8717>; he shall bring <WH935> <WH8689> his offering <WH7133>, a kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795>, a male <WH2145> without blemish <WH8549>:

And he shall lay <WH5564> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the goat <WH8163>, and kill <WH7819> <WH8804> it in the place <WH4725> where they kill <WH7819> <WH8799> the burnt offering <WH5930> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: it is a sin offering <WH2403>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the blood <WH1818> of the sin offering <WH2403> with his finger <WH676>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> it upon the shofars <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930>, and shall pour out <WH8210> <WH8799> his blood <WH1818> at the bottom <WH3247> of the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930>.

And he shall burn <WH6999> <WH8686> all his fat <WH2459> upon the altar <WH4196>, as the fat <WH2459> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>: and the Kohen <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8765> for him as concerning his sin <WH2403>, and it shall be forgiven <WH5545> <WH8738> him.

And if any <WH259> one <WH5315> of the common <WH776> people <WH5971> sin <WH2398> <WH8799> through ignorance <WH7684>, while he doeth <WH6213> <WH8800> somewhat against any <WH259> of the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> concerning things which ought not to be done <WH6213> <WH8735>, and be guilty <WH816> <WH8804>;

Or if his sin <WH2403>, which he hath sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, come to his knowledge <WH3045> <WH8717>: then he shall bring <WH935> <WH8689> his offering <WH7133>, a kid <WH8166> of the goats <WH5795>, a female <WH5347> without blemish <WH8549>, for his sin <WH2403> which he hath sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>.

And he shall lay <WH5564> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the sin offering <WH2403>, and slay <WH7819> <WH8804> the sin offering <WH2403> in the place <WH4725> of the burnt offering <WH5930>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the blood <WH1818> thereof with his finger <WH676>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> it upon the shofars <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930>, and shall pour out <WH8210> <WH8799> all the blood <WH1818> thereof at the bottom <WH3247> of the altar <WH4196>.

And he shall take away <WH5493> <WH8686> all the fat <WH2459> thereof, as the fat <WH2459> is taken away <WH5493> <WH8717> from off the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>; and the Kohen <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> it upon the altar <WH4196> for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto the YY <WH3068>; and the Kohen <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8765> for him, and it shall be forgiven <WH5545> <WH8738> him.
And if he bring <WH935> <WH8686> a lamb <WH3532> for a sin <WH2403> offering <WH7133>, he shall bring <WH935> <WH8686> it a female <WH5347> without blemish <WH8549>.

And he shall lay <WH5564> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the sin offering <WH2403>, and slay <WH7819> <WH8804> it for a sin offering <WH2403> in the place <WH4725> where they kill <WH7819> <WH8799> the burnt offering <WH5930>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the blood <WH1818> of the sin offering <WH2403> with his finger <WH676>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> it upon the shofars <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930>, and shall pour out <WH8210> <WH8799> all the blood <WH1818> thereof at the bottom <WH3247> of the altar <WH4196>:

And he shall take away <WH5493> <WH8686> all the fat <WH2459> thereof, as the fat <WH2459> of the lamb <WH3775> is taken away <WH5493> <WH8714> from the sacrifice <WH2077> of the peace offerings <WH8002>; and the Kohen <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> them upon the altar <WH4196>, according to the offerings made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>: and the Kohen <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8765> for his sin <WH2403> that he hath committed <WH2398> <WH8804>, and it shall be forgiven <WH5545> <WH8738> him.
